execution_plan.description: Retrieve all order items with their status codes from the Orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_item_id, product_id, order_id, order_item_status_code FROM Order_Items;

execution_plan.description: Get shipment tracking numbers for order items that have been shipped by joining shipment_items to shipments; restrict to order_item_ids returned by step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT si.order_item_id, s.shipment_tracking_number FROM shipment_items si JOIN shipments s ON si.shipment_id = s.shipment_id WHERE si.order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);
